:mod:`usbcamGUI`
================

.. py:module:: usbcamGUI

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Creating GUI for displaying fraem from usb camera.

.. class:: SignalHandle

   set default handler called when catch SIGINT (ctrl+c).
